title: New Skins!
body: Hey, I was checking out this YouTube channel called SkinsSpotlight and saw some Pre release teasers of Blood Moon Elise, Blood Moon Thresh, Winter Wonder Orianna, Poro Rider Sejuani and Snow Day Malzahar. they are pretty cool so go check out :D

replies.body: They really should do Blood Moon Diana instead though :'( {{item:3070}}
Just because she is the embodiment of the moon, doesn't mean she should have a Blood Moon skin.
OH MY GOD! PORO RIDING SEJUANi! <3333
